title: [Sponsor] BriefLook
content:
Use your iPhone to get an instant summary of your physical mail, even across languages! Quickly understand English mail in Spanish, Chinese, Tagalog, or many, many other combinations. Learn what the mail is, who it’s from, what it’s about, and whether (and by when) you’re supposed to do something about it — or whether it’s just ignorable junk — with a single snap. Makes life easier. Try it free!

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
